//App name AgroData //-----Strings for searching info------// //Directory where to write SharedPreference info com.example.gretchen.agrodata.LOGIN_FILE_KEY //Key for getting and setting user ID from shared preferences UserID //Key for indicating the type of table to be displayed. (Used as variable for putExtra method) TheList //Key for the product ID. (Used as a variable for putExtra method) ProductId //Key for user inventory. (Used as a variable for putExtra method) UserInventory
